title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all functional and non-functional requirements for the GravityEnergyStorage system, including energy storage capacity, efficiency, safety, and regulatory compliance.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the GravityEnergyStorage system, including the mechanical, electrical, and software components, and their interactions.

title: Develop Mechanical Components
description: Design and develop the mechanical components of the system, including the weight lifting mechanism, support structures, and safety features.

title: Develop Electrical Components
description: Design and develop the electrical components of the system, including the motor control systems, power conversion, and energy storage interfaces.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Design and develop the software components of the system, including the control systems, monitoring, and user interfaces.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Integrate the mechanical, electrical, and software components into a fully functional GravityEnergyStorage system.

title: Test and Validate System
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to validate the functionality, performance, and safety of the GravityEnergyStorage system.

title: Deploy and Maintain System
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the GravityEnergyStorage system, and develop processes for ongoing maintenance and support.
